showerReviews.reviewText: This is a really dirty loves, trash and dirt everywhere. Showers were disgusting. All they do to clean is take a towel and smear dirt and hair all around. Hair and gunk on the toilet, sink (didn't get a picture of the sink), and shower. Tow …

… service was awful they don't know how to talk to people in a professional way. And the showers omg i was just scared to not catch something in there. That's how dirty it was mold and rust everywhere bathroom was leaking all over the floor …

… Shower room was clean to my liking, restroom was in order as well. I know sometimes some truck drivers behaves like babies by leaving trash and messes all over the restrooms and in the toilets which I believe makes it hard to keep up with, …

I always shower at love’s truck stops I am an OTR truck Driver and this is the first time I have ever went into a shower at a loves location and it was dirty I went into the first bathroom and it was urine, hair, & dirt all on the side of …

Very displeased with shower conditions. Due to the fact of mold and mildew in the showers. Dust accumulated all over the bathroom even on top of the toilet. Shower looked like it was previously used and not cleaned before allowing the next …

This is the worst Love's location I have been so far. After waiting half an hour for mi turn to take a shower... it was disgusting. See attached pictures. The list they can do is property clean them. Drivers paid a lot just to take a decent …
Mcd, subway,mcd, clean shower and restrooms only problem is less truck parkings

The showers certainly need attention the toilet seat was falling off wall tiles missing with black mold...i had to wait with 4 people agead of me because shower 6 and 7 which are the new ones the emolyees put out of service so they can use …

They are cleaning masy floors with shower towels and then maybe wash them with out Landry detergent, coze they take it home for all employees, they don’t care about people who take a shower, nasty place, everyone is smile, even manager …

$18.00 for a nasty, moldy shower! Hair and trash was just pushed and piled behind the door. If they're going to charge that much for a shower, it could at least be clean. It was disgusting! Very reminiscent of todays Pilot.. On the up side, …

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower was dirty but the guy Tim took care of me and apologized for the new gentlemen who was supposed to do it. Tim is the reason I changed my review from 1 star to 5. He was very professional
Clean Truckstop. Staff is very nice. Showers are always clean. It never takes a long time to get an available shower. Great coffee. They have Mcdonalds and Subway inside.

Thank you!  We stopped with 5 buses on a school trip and the store employees worked hard to open up extra restrooms (the shower restrooms) to get us in and out of there quick.  Thanks for the above and beyond service!
There was somebody’s dried up mucus in the sink in the shower. Not something you wanna see when you trying to brush your teeth

0 start for cleaning a shower.
This they respect to those who pay to get a clean shower.

The store is nice. I went to get a shower today & it wasn't clean (Soap Suda still on walls & the floor was still wet from the last person)! I told the manager & they had someone come clean it AGAIN! If an employee can't TRULY clean the …
Stayed the night, got a shower and a fountain drink. Very friendly and welcoming. There's an older lady who was so amazing and helpful. Great attitude. The shower was warm and clean.

The restrooms in the shower for very clean. There is plenty of parking for the semi or camper also a big parking lot for automobiles it is in a well-lit area and there is security present at all times. I truly enjoyed my experience here …
showerReviews.uniqueId: Joseph Gardiner (Joey bag of doughnuts)_The_restrooms_in_the_shower_for_very_clean._There__8 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: … I will avoid this pilot from now on. I guess if you just need fuel and a shower it will do but don't expect too much and you won't be disappointed.
Cashier was rude and didn't seem to be in a good mood to work, shower had no towels available. Overall a terrible day at this particular pilot today.

locations.title: ONE9 Travel Center
locations.content: ONE9 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … into the men’s bathroom to find an employee mopping the piss dried bathroom floor with a folded gray towel hooked up to a mop handle. The very same towel they put in the showers for drivers to use. Glad I always bring my own towel to shower

… and went out of her way to even help me park since the parking was small. The workers were so helpful and went out their way to help me, shower was really clean.  I have never felt so welcomed, it was much appreciated.... Good job Pilot!
Clean bathroom to shower in! Very nice folks! Pleasant visit. Not alot of truck parking

Came here to take a shower because I can't take a shower at home because I'm a truck driver. The lady told me she closed the showers for the night. When I asked her the reason why she said she didn't want to be bothered with it. So why come …

I got here and went in to purchase a shower. I was told they were full. The two employees are just talking. And come to find out the showers weren’t full they were just dirty and they didn’t want to clean em. Smh. This is below the …
Great little pilot to stop in at. Very friendly people. Hot showers, however #1 had a broken shower nozzle, still worked great for its purpose. Parking lot is a little small. About 20 trucks.

It’s look good and shower 2 is cleaned
As I see

This is the second time I stopped here in a month that they don't have no water at night or no showers no coffee and no food you drive 10 hours a day and a Truck you want a hot shower and something to eat they got you by the balls because …
This is from a trucker's perspective. The parking lot is tiny. It's almost always full with trucks parked everywhere. They only have 3 shower's, but they are clean. The staff is friendly.
Stopped by at 3:30 in a morning for shower. Had to wait non were clean. But pretty quickly mine was ready. Fresh coffee.

locations.content: Harry's #54 Truck Stop & Deli may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … Showers $15. Very clean. Love the shower head …

Very clean establishment large parking spaces with numbers. They have a shower and washer and dryer. Bring your own towel and wash rag . They also have a deli. They do have a small Trucking supplies and snacks. Very nice staff parking is $ …
Always nice people here and always clean! Good food, $15 shower (very clean) and $2.50 to wash AND dry laundry.

Everything was good truck parking $15 .Showers $15 . and food and service but went to shower and had to ask for towels and they have no washcloths .so if you go bring your own towels and washcloth.just a heads up.

Good customer service and good truck parking and good food clan shower and  good service I highly recommend this place g
Every one come here and stop

… read all the Great Outstanding Reviews from everyone, I was much more interested going to Harry's, especially having showers, Nice Deli, Convenient 24 hr Convenient Store, Outstanding Overnight Truck parking , Outstanding fuel island as I …
They would not give you a free shower with Mudflap also 80 gal to get a free parking
